data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Orenburg in their own half.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in the half of Orenburg.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow close to the penalty box.
Orenburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Rostoshi Orenburg's Djordje Despotovic is caught offside.
Ball safe as Orenburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Orenburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
Orenburg have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Orenburg attack but Uros Radakovic's header doesn't find the target.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rostoshi.
Joel Fameyeh for the home team is judged to be offside.
Aleksandr Sobolev (Spartak Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Goal kick for Orenburg at Gazovik Stadium.
Ricardo Alves for Orenburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Orenburg.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Orenburg pushes forward through Djordje Despotovic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Orenburg have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Orenburg's Joel Fameyeh scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Uros Radakovic with an assist there.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Orenburg in their own half.
Orenburg are coming forward and Danijel Miskic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Orenburg at Gazovik Stadium.
Free kick for Orenburg in their own half.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow drive upfield and Nikolay Rasskazov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Orenburg defender.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
In Rostoshi Spartak Moscow attack through Ayrton Lucas. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Orenburg at Gazovik Stadium.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Orenburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Orenburg needs to be cautious. Spartak Moscow have an attacking throw-in.
Spartak Moscow's Nikolay Rasskazov is whistled for offside at Gazovik Stadium.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Orenburg close to the penalty box.
Pavel Maslov (Spartak Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match at Gazovik Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Joel Fameyeh, who is down injured.
Uros Radakovic (Orenburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spartak Moscow goal kick.
Joel Fameyeh has recovered and rejoins the match in Rostoshi.
Throw-in high up the field for Spartak Moscow in Rostoshi.
Spartak Moscow have a dangerous throw-in.
Orenburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orenburg's half?
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow.
Vasiliy Kazarcev blows against Orenburg's Andrey Malykh for offside.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Orenburg in their own half.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rostoshi.
Throw-in Spartak Moscow.
Throw-in for Spartak Moscow at Gazovik Stadium.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Goal! Ezequiel Ponce levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Aleksandr Sobolev to set up the goal.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Aleksandr Sobolev for Spartak Moscow is whistled offside.
Jordan Larsson of Spartak Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball safe as Spartak Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Rostoshi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half has come to a close in Rostoshi.
Sergey Terekhov (Orenburg) gets booked by Vasiliy Kazarcev, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Orenburg to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Corner awarded to Orenburg.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Orenburg throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Orenburg throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Orenburg have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Djordje Despotovic for the home team is judged to be offside.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Spartak Moscow in their own half.
In Rostoshi Spartak Moscow's Aleksandr Sobolev is caught offside.
Danijel Miskic of Orenburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a throw-in for Orenburg, close to Spartak Moscow's area.
Orenburg are pushing forward but Ricardo Alves's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostoshi.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in the half of Orenburg.
Danijel Miskic is booked for the home team.
Spartak Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
Free kick for Orenburg in their own half.
Andrey Eshchenko is replacing Nikolay Rasskazov for the away team.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Orenburg have a goal kick.
Spartak Moscow will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Orenburg.
Spartak Moscow's Ezequiel Ponce gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orenburg defender.
Orenburg to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
Orenburg have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Orenburg's Djordje Despotovic gets in a shot on goal at Gazovik Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Orenburg have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Joel Fameyeh (Orenburg) strikes at Gazovik Stadium but his header is cleared.
Jordan Larsson is on target to give Spartak Moscow a 1-2 advantage.
Samuel Gigot instrumental with a fine assist.
The away team have replaced Ezequiel Ponce with Reziuan Mirzov. This is the second substitution made today by Domenico Tedesco.
The away team replace Zelimkhan Bakaev with Lorenzo Melgarejo.
Spartak Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Rostoshi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Konstantin Emelianov (Orenburg) is making a first substitution, with Fedor Cernych replacing Ricardo Alves.
Can Spartak Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orenburg's half?
Djordje Despotovic (Orenburg) gets in a strike â€“ but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Konstantin Emelianov is making the team's second substitution at Gazovik Stadium with Mamadou Sylla replacing Djordje Despotovic.
Free kick Spartak Moscow.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Orenburg in their own half.
Can Orenburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spartak Moscow's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Orenburg in Rostoshi.
Goal kick for Spartak Moscow at Gazovik Stadium.
Andrey Malykh (Orenburg) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Spartak Moscow a goal kick.
Throw-in Orenburg.
Orenburg push forward at Gazovik Stadium and Fedor Cernych gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Spartak Moscow defence.
Orenburg have a dangerous throw-in.
In Rostoshi, Islambek Kuat (Orenburg) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Orenburg.
Throw-in for Orenburg in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Can Orenburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostoshi.
Orenburg to take a throw-in in Spartak Moscow territory.
Free kick for Spartak Moscow in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Spartak Moscow!
Georgi Dzhikiya for Spartak Moscow drives towards goal at Gazovik Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Spartak Moscow.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Rostoshi.
Spartak Moscow drive forward but Aleksandr Sobolev is judged offside.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Orenburg throw-in in Spartak Moscow's half.
Spartak Moscow have a goal kick.
Spartak Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Orenburg in the half of Spartak Moscow.
Orenburg push forward at Gazovik Stadium and Joel Fameyeh gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spartak Moscow defence.
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ayrton Lucas (Spartak Moscow) has received a first yellow card.
